Title: The Song Remains the Same (2)
Plot: Dawson & Joey's reunion leads to an evening of truth and intimacy, which is ruined when Dawson receives a phone call from another woman. Pacey gets a job interview that could change his life. Sparks fly between Jen and CJ, a handsome new peer counselor she meets at school.
GuestStars: Chandler McIntyre, Nick Gomez, Johnny Alonso, Melissa Ponzio
